title: Create offline benchmark + regression tests to quantify false merges across domains

sections.text: Build an evaluation dataset of labeled issue pairs/clusters from multiple domains (e.g., billing, API, mobile) and define metrics focused on false-merge rate/precision. Add an automated offline test that runs clustering changes against this benchmark and flags regressions by domain/integration source. Use results to recommend default similarity thresholds per domain/source to reduce over-merging.
